page.title: 11SOUTH LODGE
page.content: {South Lodge}is an{old people's home for 36 people. The residents are split into 5 groups for ease of organising meals & watching T.V. The oldest person to have lived in the home was 102.Now the oldest person is 97 and the youngest 63. One resident has lived there for 17 years. Some have their own rooms for sleeping. The rest are in groups of 2 or 4. There are 2-3 helpers a week who work shifts of 39 hours. {Visitors,}mainly friends and relatives come every day. {The council}is very aware of the safety requirements and new fire equipment has just been installed. For{entertainment}they play bingo once a month, have presents at Christmas and on their birthdays they get a cake. In September they go for a weeks holiday to Skegness.
